attributes.action: Sort Out MP'S Behaviour In The House Of Commons
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We are heartily sick of the childish behaviour by MP's in the House Of Commons. The constant childish interruptions when opposition speakers are trying to make a point, with catcalls and stupid comments are a sign of loutish behaviour and should be banned.

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
